pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

descript.abstract: Minnesota Wild Turkey permit area boundaries.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this shapefile is to provide turkey permit area boundaries for use in population management, harvest summaries, and mapping of spring and fall turkey hunting information.

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset.

idinfo.accconst: No special restrictions beyond those described in the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement.
idinfo.useconst: No special restrictions beyond those described in the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement.

cntaddr.address: DNR Forest Lake Office 5463 W Broadway

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct. All polygons are closed and lines intersect where intended.
dataqual.complete: This layer will be updated twice a year: In spring, to reflect open and closed permit areas for the spring turkey season In late summer, to reflect open and closed permit areas for the fall turkey season.

horizpa.horizpar: Original features were copied from USGS DLG data in 1992. All updates have been done by copying features from the Minnesota Department of Transportation roads layers; Minnesota DNR lakes, rivers and streams layers; and from other sources as needed.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).
